SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: IF &UC4RB_TIO_INIT_WAIT_TIME# GT 0 : SET &INIT_WAIT_TIME# = MULT(&UC4RB_TIO_INIT_WAIT_TIME#, 60) : P "Initially waiting for [&UC4RB_TIO_INIT_WAIT_TIME#] minutes." : WAIT &INIT_WAIT_TIME# : ENDIF
: SET &LOOP_COUNT# = 0 : SET &SUCCESS# = 0 : SET &FLAG# = 1 : WHILE &LOOP_COUNT# <> &UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_CNT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SCAN_STATUS : If &SUCCESS#=1 : SET &LOOP_COUNT# = &UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_CNT# : ELSE : P "Retry Count : &LOOP_COUNT#" : P "Waiting for &UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_CNT# sec" : WAIT &UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_INTRVL# : SET &LOOP_COUNT#=&LOOP_COUNT#+1 : ENDIF : ENDWHILE
: IF &SUCCESS#=0 : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully within specified time limit." : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: Timeout Occurred." : ENDIF
: IF &FLAG#=0 : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully as the execution have the status : &TIO_SCAN_STATUS#" : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: Execution failed for Infrastructure Id &UC4RB_TIO_SCAN_ID# : with status : &TIO_SCAN_STATUS#" : ENDIF
